description:
http://www.CityTV.nl
http://www.t-dose.org/

T-DOSE 2012 Open Source, Tools for your devops stack, Kris Buytaert

T-DOSE 2012 Playlist:
http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBZBIkixHEieUwHjKqPMc9ckLLsMKiK4j

Technology moves fast, most people are so busy they don't have time to keep up with what's new, or sometimes don't really understand the need for these tools, until they take 5 minutes and listen to somebody using them.
This talk will go over a bunch of unmissable open source system tools, some of them didn't even exist 2 years ago,
We won't spill which ones we'll cover .. but rest assured .. you'll learn a few

27 and 28 October 2012 at the Fontys University of Applied Science in Eindhoven.
title: T-DOSE 2012 Open Source, Tools for your devops stack, Kris Buytaert
